package.name: ohrad_x3_sensor_config_2
package.description: The ohrad_x3_sensor_config_2 package derived from x3_sensor_config_4 (https://bitbucket.org/osrf/subt/wiki/robots) with the addition of LIDAR Lite v3 (http://static.garmin.com/pumac/LIDAR_Lite_v3_Operation_Manual_and_Technical_Specifications.pdf) sensors, used for floor/ceiling detection, to the top/bottom of the platform.
package.author: Arthur Schang
